sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginservisService } from '../servisi/loginservis.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Ucenik } from '../models/ucenik'; import { Nastavnik } from '../models/nastavnik'; import { Cas } from '../models/cas'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ucenik', templateUrl: './ucenik.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ucenik.component.css'] }) export class UcenikComponent { constructor(private servis : LoginservisService, private ruter : Router ){} loggedUcenik : Ucenik = new Ucenik() editedUcenik : Ucenik = new Ucenik() where : number = 0 called : number = 0 nastavnici : Nastavnik[] = [] search : string = "" odrzani : Cas[] = [] neodrzani : Cas[] = [] searchIme: string = ''; searchPrezime: string = ''; ngOnInit(){ this.where = 1 this.called = 0 let logged = localStorage.getItem("logged") if(logged){ this.servis.getucenik(logged).subscribe(user=>{ this.loggedUcenik = user; this.editedUcenik = new Ucenik(); }) if(this.loggedUcenik.schooltype ==="osnovna" && this.loggedUcenik.schoolgrade < 5 ){ this.servis.getnastavniciporazred(1).subscribe( nst =>{ this.nastavnici = nst }) }else if(this.loggedUcenik.schooltype ==="osnovna"){ this.servis.getnastavniciporazred(2).subscribe( nst =>{ this.nastavnici = nst }) }else{ this.servis.getnastavniciporazred(3).subscribe( nst =>{ this.nastavnici = nst }) } this.servis.casget(1,logged).subscribe(data=>{ if(data){ this.odrzani = data } }) this.servis.casget(0,logged).subscribe(data=>{ if(data){ this.neodrzani = data } }) } } changeWhere(value: number): void { this.where = value; } saveChanges(){ this.editedUcenik.username = this.loggedUcenik.username if(this.editedUcenik.name === "")this.editedUcenik.name = this.loggedUcenik.name if(this.editedUcenik.surname === "")this.editedUcenik.surname = this.loggedUcenik.surname if(this.editedUcenik.adress === "")this.editedUcenik.adress = this.loggedUcenik.adress if(this.editedUcenik.email === "")this.editedUcenik.email = this.loggedUcenik.email if(this.editedUcenik.telephone === 0)this.editedUcenik.telephone = this.loggedUcenik.telephone if(this.editedUcenik.schooltype === "")this.editedUcenik.schooltype = this.loggedUcenik.schooltype if(this.loggedUcenik.schooltype === "osnovna" && this.editedUcenik.schooltype !== "osnovna" && this.editedUcenik.schooltype !== "" ){ this.editedUcenik.schoolgrade = 1 } this.servis.updateucenik(this.editedUcenik).subscribe(data=>{ }) this.ngOnInit() } incrementSchoolGrade(){ this.called = 1 let num = this.loggedUcenik.schoolgrade if(this.loggedUcenik.schooltype === "osnovna" && num == 8){ alert("Ne moze se povecati razred dok se ne prebacite u srednju!!") this.editedUcenik.schoolgrade = this.loggedUcenik.schoolgrade return; } if(num == 4 && this.loggedUcenik.schooltype !== "osnovna"){ alert("Cetvrta godina srednje ne mozete povecavati godinu") this.editedUcenik.schoolgrade = this.loggedUcenik.schoolgrade return } num++; this.editedUcenik.schoolgrade = num; } filterNastavnici(){ this.nastavnici.forEach(nastavnik => { const imeMatch = this.searchIme ? nastavnik.name.toLowerCase().includes(this.searchIme.toLowerCase()) : true; const prezimeMatch = this.searchPrezime ? nastavnik.surname.toLowerCase().includes(this.searchPrezime.toLowerCase()) : true; nastavnik.visible = imeMatch && prezimeMatch ; }); } }
